even if still a draft as well as the Discipline and Sanction policy by end of day today Tammie If you can get all the hand outs in pack that would be great but it is not required Please speak with Debbie Brackett if you have any questions issues etc and we thank you very much in advance for your assistance Looking forward to meeting you Lisa Feld CRC Americas doc Visit our website at This Credit NETCO Start Up Plan Cc Louise Attached is the electronic version of what Debbie delivered to you this afternoon Regards Stephanie

Flood Relief for RAC EmployeeAs many of you remember one of our RAC employees was flooded out of their house in June This flood severely damaged their house and ruined virtually all of their belongings inside the house Many of you generously donated cash clothing and toiletries which were immediately forwarded to the family Your generosity and responsiveness in their time of need was greatly appreciated They have been working hard to rebuild their house since June and are finally close to moving back home We are seeking your help again in donating ANY home furnishings you can Our goal is to collect as many items as we can If this family cannot use an item maybe one of their neighbors can Here are some of the items we have collected so far washer dryer Richard Lauer breakfast room table chairs Stephanie McGinnis console TV Cassandra Alston CD tape player Adam Watts couch tv stand Rick Bittner kitchen housewares galore Karen Barbour Nintendo Christine and Stephanie Barbour Karens kids VCR pictures for walls Stephanie McGinnis boys bicycle and rollerblades Lynn Bellinghausen We will be renting a moving truck on Saturday November nd to pick up donations and deliver them to this RAC family If you can bring your donations to the office please call me and I will hold in my garage until our November nd delivery date If you would like for me to pick up your donations at your house please let me know what your donation will be and your home address so I can map my route and give you an estimated pickup time Thank you kindness and I look forward to hearing from you Stephanie
